Enter Email Please enter the Email Enter Password Please enter the password
import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import { NgForm } from "@angular/forms"; import { AuthData } from "../auth-data.model"; import { AuthService } from "../auth.service"; @Component({ selector: "app-signup", templateUrl: "./signup.component.html", styleUrls: ["./signup.component.scss"], }) export class SignupComponent implements OnInit { isLoading = false; constructor(public authService: AuthService) {} ngOnInit(): void {} onsignup(form: NgForm) { // console.log(form); if (form.invalid) return; const auth: AuthData = this.authService.createUser(auth); } }
